name: calendar
description: Agent integration with MS Graph's calendar

subSchemas.description: Calendar agent that keeps track of important dates and events. Use it to schedule appointments, set reminders, and organize activities.

actions.name: scheduleEvent
actions.description: Schedule a new event on the calendar

actions.name: addParticipant
actions.description: Add a participant to an event

actions.name: findThisWeeksEvents
actions.description: Find all events happening this week

actions.name: removeEvent
actions.description: Remove an event from the calendar

subSchemas.description: Code agent helps you with productivity in using an editor and performing actions like creating files, editor customization, writing code, intelligent code suggestions, real-time error detection, debugging, and source control tasks etc.

actions.name: changeColorScheme
actions.description: Change the color scheme of the editor

actions.name: splitEditor
actions.description: ACTION: Split an editor window into multiple panes showing the same file or different files side-by-side.

actions.name: changeEditorLayout
actions.description: Change the editor layout to single, double or three column layout

actions.name: newFile
actions.description: Create a new file, this is not same as opening a file or finding a file in the workspace

subSchemas.description: Code agent that helps you debug code including handling actions like showing the debug panel, adding/toggling breakpoints, stepping in/out of code etc.

actions.name: showDebugPanel
actions.description: Show debug panel or window in the editor or code window, if not already visible

subSchemas.description: Code agent that helps you work with display keyboard bindings, Zoom in, Zoom out, do text search and replace, show extensions etc.

actions.name: showSearch
actions.description: Show search or replace pane/window in the sidebar to search for text in the files

actions.name: openMarkdownPreviewToSide
actions.description: Open markdown preview to the side

subSchemas.description: Code agent that helps you perform actions like finding a file, go to a symbol or a line in a file, Open new vscode window, show the command palette, user settings json etc.

actions.name: showCommandPalette
actions.description: Show or open the command palette that allows to search and execute commands

actions.name: gotoFileOrLineOrSymbol
actions.description: Quick option to access a file, alternate way to search a file by name using keyboard shortcuts

subSchemas.description: Code agent that helps you perform vscode editor actions like create a new file, go to a reference, reveal a declaration, clipboard copy or paste, add a comment line etc.

actions.name: fixCodeProblem
actions.description: schema to fix a problem (diagnostic) in the code.

actions.name: moveCursorInFile
actions.description: ACTION: Move the cursor to a specific position within a file (for navigation or editing preparation).

actions.name: insertOrDeleteLines
actions.description: Action for inserting or deleting lines in a file.

actions.name: createFile
actions.description: Action to create a new file in the editor

subSchemas.description: Code agent that helps you perform vscode workbench actions like open a file, close a file etc.
Code agent that helps you perform vscode extension actions like show, install, update, enable, disable, uninstall extensions etc.

actions.name: checkExtensionAvailable
actions.description: The action checks/searches if an extension is available based on user requests like is the copilot extension available?

subSchemas.description: Desktop agent that allows you to manage the programs running on a computer, change Windows settings, control the desktop environment, and perform actions such as opening a file, closing a window, tiling windows, launching a program, maximizing windows, adjusting display settings, managing privacy settings, and controlling system features.

actions.name: launchProgram
actions.description: Launches a new program window on a Windows Desktop

actions.name: closeProgram
actions.description: Closes a program window on a Windows Desktop

actions.name: tile
actions.description: Positions program windows on a program window on a Windows Desktop

actions.name: maximize
actions.description: Maximizes a program window on a Windows Desktop

actions.name: minimize
actions.description: Minimizes a program window on a Windows Desktop

actions.name: switchTo
actions.description: Sets focus to a program window on a Windows Desktop

actions.name: setThemeMode
actions.description: Sets the theme mode of the current [windows] desktop

actions.name: disconnectWifi
actions.description: Disconnects from the current wifi network

actions.name: nextDesktop
actions.description: switches to the next Windows Desktop

actions.name: previousDesktop
actions.description: switches to the previous Windows Desktop

actions.name: debug
actions.description: Attaches the debugger to the AutoShell process

actions.name: setTextSize
actions.description: Changes the text size that appears throughout Windows and your apps

subSchemas.description: Desktop agent for display and screen settings including night light, color temperature, scaling, orientation, and rotation lock.

actions.name: EnableBlueLightFilterSchedule
actions.description: Enables or disables blue light filter schedule (Night Light)

actions.name: adjustColorTemperature
actions.description: Adjusts the color temperature for Night Light

actions.name: AdjustScreenOrientation
actions.description: Adjusts screen orientation between portrait and landscape

subSchemas.description: Desktop agent for personalization settings including transparency effects, title bar colors, and high contrast themes.

actions.name: ApplyColorToTitleBar
actions.description: Applies accent color to title bars

subSchemas.description: Desktop agent for taskbar settings including auto-hide, alignment, task view, widgets, badges, and system clock options.

actions.name: TaskViewVisibility
actions.description: Shows or hides the Task View button

actions.name: ToggleWidgetsButtonVisibility
actions.description: Shows or hides the Widgets button

actions.name: ShowBadgesOnTaskbar
actions.description: Shows or hides badges on taskbar icons

actions.name: DisplaySecondsInSystrayClock
actions.description: Shows seconds in the system tray clock

subSchemas.description: Desktop agent for mouse and touchpad settings including cursor speed, scroll lines, button configuration, pointer precision, and touchpad controls.

actions.name: MouseWheelScrollLines
actions.description: Sets the number of lines to scroll per mouse wheel notch

actions.name: EnhancePointerPrecision
actions.description: Enables or disables enhanced pointer precision (mouse acceleration)

subSchemas.description: Desktop agent for privacy settings to manage microphone, camera, and location access for applications.
Desktop agent for power management settings including battery saver and power mode configuration.

actions.name: BatterySaverActivationLevel
actions.description: Sets the battery saver activation threshold

actions.name: setPowerModePluggedIn
actions.description: Sets power mode when plugged in

actions.name: SetPowerModeOnBattery
actions.description: Sets power mode when on battery

subSchemas.description: Desktop agent for system settings including accessibility features, file explorer options, time settings, focus assist, multi-monitor configuration, and other system-level controls.

actions.name: enableMeteredConnections
actions.description: Enables or disables metered connection settings

actions.name: ShowFileExtensions
actions.description: Shows or hides file extensions in File Explorer

actions.name: ShowHiddenAndSystemFiles
actions.description: Shows or hides hidden and system files in File Explorer

actions.name: AutomaticTimeSettingAction
actions.description: Enables or disables automatic time synchronization

actions.name: AutomaticDSTAdjustment
actions.description: Enables or disables automatic DST adjustment

actions.name: EnableQuietHours
actions.description: Enables or disables Focus Assist (Quiet Hours)

actions.name: RememberWindowLocations
actions.description: Remembers window locations based on monitor configuration

actions.name: MinimizeWindowsOnMonitorDisconnectAction
actions.description: Minimizes windows when a monitor is disconnected

name: email
description: Agent integration with MS Graph's email

subSchemas.description: Email agent helps manage email messages. Use it to send, reply, forward, find messages etc.

actions.name: sendEmail
actions.description: Type for sending a simple email

actions.name: replyEmail
actions.description: Type for replying to an email

actions.name: findEmail
actions.description: Type for finding an email message (search for emails)

subSchemas.description: Image agent that creates images using AI image modes.

actions.name: createImageAction
actions.description: creates an image based on the supplied description

name: list
description: Agent to create and manage lists

subSchemas.description: List agent with actions to create lists, show list items, add and remove list items

actions.name: addItems
actions.description: add one or more items to a list; if the list does not exist, create it

actions.name: removeItems
actions.description: remove one or more items from a list

actions.name: getList
actions.description: use this action to show the user what's on the list, for example, "What's on my grocery list?" or "what are the contents of my to do list?"

name: photo
description: Agent to take and upload photos

subSchemas.description: Photo agent that helps the user provide images to the system either by taking pictures or uploading existing images.

actions.name: takePhoto
actions.description: uses a camera attached to the system to take a photo

subSchemas.description: Music Player agent that lets you search for, play and control music.

actions.name: playRandom
actions.description: Use playRandom when the user asks for some music to play

actions.name: playFromCurrentTrackList
actions.description: play the track single track at index 'trackNumber' in the current track list

actions.name: status
actions.description: show now playing including track information, and playback status including playback device

actions.name: setMaxVolume
actions.description: set max volume for the current device

actions.name: changeVolume
actions.description: change volume plus or minus a specified percentage

actions.name: searchTracks
actions.description: this action is only used when the user asks for a search as in 'search', 'find', 'look for'

actions.name: searchForPlaylists
actions.description: this action is used when the user asks to search for public playlists that match a query string like 'search playlist bach hilary hahn'; it is not used to get a specific playlist by name (use GetPlaylistAction for that); it is not used to search for tracks (use SearchTracksAction for that)

actions.name: getFavorites
actions.description: result of this action is an entity of type 'track-list' with the user's favorites

actions.name: createPlaylist
actions.description: create a new playlist, optionally with a list of songs specified by title and artist

actions.name: addCurrentTrackToPlaylist
actions.description: add the currently playing track to a playlist

actions.name: addToPlaylistFromCurrentTrackList
actions.description: add to the named playlist one or more tracks starting at index 'trackNumber' in the current track list

actions.name: addSongsToPlaylist
actions.description: add songs to a playlist by specifying track names and optional artists

actions.name: getQueue
actions.description: set the current track list to the queue of upcoming tracks

name: playerLocal
description: Agent to play local music files

subSchemas.description: Local Music Player agent that lets you play and control local audio files.

actions.name: playFile
actions.description: Play a specific audio file by path or name

actions.name: playFolder
actions.description: Play all audio files in a folder

actions.name: playFromQueue
actions.description: Play a specific track from the current queue by index

actions.name: status
actions.description: Show now playing status including track information and playback state

actions.name: setVolume
actions.description: Set volume to a specific level (0-100)

actions.name: changeVolume
actions.description: Change volume by a relative amount

actions.name: listFiles
actions.description: List audio files in the music folder or a specified folder

actions.name: searchFiles
actions.description: Search for audio files by name

actions.name: addToQueue
actions.description: Add a file or files to the playback queue

actions.name: setMusicFolder
actions.description: Set the default music folder path

actions.name: showMusicFolder
actions.description: Show the current music folder path

subSchemas.description: Video agent that creates videos using AI text to video modes.

actions.name: createVideoAction
actions.description: creates a video based on the supplied description

name: weather
description: Agent to get weather information including current conditions, forecasts, and alerts

subSchemas.description: Weather agent with actions to get current conditions, forecasts, and alerts
